announce.message: I Do PVP: ATTENTION! Event arena -I Do PVP- will be hosted in 20 minutes! (One round take about 30 minutes)
I Do PVP: ATTENTION! In War arena you cannot lose any items/levels in case of a death! unless you make suicide with field runes or die by a monster!
I Do PVP: ATTENTION! In -I Do PVP- event it's all players vs all! team up if you have a chance! but only one player can win!
I Do PVP: ATTENTION! Event arena -I Do PVP- will be hosted in 10 minutes! (One round take about 30 minutes)
I Do PVP: ATTENTION! Event will be hosted in 5 minutes! Please go to any City temple and ask the monk for Event arena!
I Do PVP: Attention! Event will be hosted in 3 minutes! if you are too late you cannot join event!
I Do PVP: Attention! Event will be hosted in 1 minute! if you are too late you cannot join event!
I Do PVP: THE TELEPORTS WILL BE OPEN IN 10 SECONDS! PLEASE ENTER THEM FAST AS POSSIBLE!
I Do PVP: EVENT HAS STARTED! LET THE BEST PVPERS WIN!
I Do PVP: IN ONE MINUTE YOU WILL HAVE COMPANY BY MINOTAUR MAGES!
I Do PVP: IN ONE MINUTE A DEMON WILL SAY HI TO YOU!
I Do PVP: THE TELEPORTS WILL BE OPEN IN ONE MINUTE! PLEASE MOVE TO THE EAST PART OF ARENA!
I Do PVP: THE TElEPORTS HAS OPEN! PLEASE ENTER THEM FAST AS POSSIBLE!
I Do PVP: THE EVENT-ROUND IS ALMOST FINIShED!
